attributes.action: End the migrant crisis by adopting a transparent zero tolerance policy.
attributes.additional_details: We, the people of the United Kingdom, demand an end to the movement of illegal migrants across the channel and demand a zero tolerance and transparent approach to the numbers reaching our shores and the numbers of migrants returned to France.
attributes.background: This government mandated that there would be fewer lower-skilled migrants and overall numbers would come down. We were assured that the British people would always be in control. However, after paying millions to France we have just had the largest number of migrants reach our shores illegally.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we have open on this topic:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
